page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE IN 1985
page.content: Louise telephoned after tea to ask me if I wanted to play so I went to her house. First we went to the shop, then we called for Jane, then we went to play in our garage. After that we went to my Auntie DorisÂ£s and it rained so we all went home very wet. When I got in I practised my organ then I had some toast. Louise rang again to ask me to come early in the morning so I asked her if she would be my partner for our visit to the baths. I said goodnight to my mum and my dad and then I went to bed
